Name: Adriatic Pizza
About the game: ** About ** Adriatic Pizza is a peaceful pizzayolo 3D simulator. In a world inspired by Porco Rosso, explore islands, deliver pizzas, meet wonderful characters and watch out for your Seaplane fuel ! ** Features ** ● Explore beautiful islands and deliver pizzas with your Seaplane ● Cooking pizzas and take care of your garden ● Carry out your various missions ● Build your new restaurant ● Discover a nice story inspired by Porco Rosso ● Meet wonderful characters and listen to their stories
